DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying quality life cancer survivor may help determine long-term effect breast cancer may help improve quality life future cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study quality life African-American Caucasian female breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life African-American Caucasian Female Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare disease-specific , generic , global quality life measure African-American survivor breast cancer Caucasian survivor breast cancer . - Compare quality life measure African-American survivor breast cancer control group African-American woman history breast cancer . OUTLINE : Patients healthy participant complete battery quality life ( QOL ) questionnaires approximately 65 minute mail phone , include Sexual Function Index , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy - Fatigue , Concerns About Recurrence Scale , measure symptoms/side effect ( include sleep problem ) , RAND Physical Functioning -10 Scale , Center Epidemiologic Studies - Depression Scale , assessment family function/social support , ENRICH Marital Satisfaction Scale , Reed Spiritual Perspective Scale , assessments cop body image , Post-Traumatic Growth Inventory , Index Well-being . Demographic , disease , treatment , comorbidity information , well menstrual gynecological history , work status insurance history , measure health care provider communication collect use questionnaire medical chart review . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 195 patient healthy participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : AfricanAmerican Caucasian breast cancer survivor Diagnosed stage IIII breast cancer year 19952003 Receiving follow care Indiana University Cancer Center ( IUCC ) , IUCC Northside Clinic , Spring Mill Clinic , Wishard Memorial Hospital Healthy AfricanAmerican Acquaintance AfricanAmerican breast cancer survivor Not know breast cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Female PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
